languages.text: {n}Ледяное спокойствие в вашем голосе оказывается действеннее любых угроз. Пред ликом {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}неумолимого судьи{/d} даже столь отчаянный мутант поддается мгновению страха — и этого достаточно, чтобы прицел его пистолета дрогнул и чуть отклонился.{/n} "Сегодня приговоры буду выносить я, и ты — перв{mf|ый|ая} в списке осужденных!"

{n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even this most foolhardy of mutants succumbs to momentary fear, enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ледяное спокойствие в вашем голосе оказывается действеннее любых угроз. Пред ликом {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}неумолимого судьи{/d} даже столь отчаянный мутант поддается мгновению страха — и этого достаточно, чтобы прицел его пистолета дрогнул и чуть отклонился.{/n} "Сегодня приговоры буду выносить я, и ты — перв{mf|ый|ая} в списке осужденных!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even such a desperate mutant gives in to momentary fear, which is enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"

languages.text: {n}Votre ton glaçant semble plus efficace que n'importe quelle menace. Face à un {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}juge implacable{/d}, même ce mutant particulièrement hardi tremble d'effroi, suffisamment pour que le canon de son arme dévie de sa cible.{/n} « Je suis ici pour livrer des verdicts et je commencerai par le vôtre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even this most foolhardy of mutants succumbs to momentary fear, enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre ton glaçant semble plus efficace que n'importe quelle menace. Face à un {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}juge implacable{/d}, même ce mutant particulièrement hardi tremble d'effroi, suffisamment pour que le canon de son arme dévie de sa cible.{/n} « Je suis ici pour livrer des verdicts et je commencerai par le vôtre ! »

languages.text: {n}あなたの声に宿る氷のような静けさは、いかなる脅しよりも効果的だった。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}容赦ない裁判官{/d}を前にして、どんなに無謀な変異体でさえ一瞬恐怖に屈し、その拳銃の狙いがわずかに逸れた。{/n}「今日は判決を下す日だ。お前がその最初の一人となる！」
languages.original_text: {n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even this most foolhardy of mutants succumbs to momentary fear, enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの声に宿る氷のような静けさは、いかなる脅しよりも効果的だった。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}容赦ない裁判官{/d}を前にして、どんなに無謀な変異体でさえ一瞬恐怖に屈し、その拳銃の狙いがわずかに逸れた。{/n}「今日は判決を下す日だ。お前がその最初の一人となる！」

languages.text: {n}Sesindeki buz sakinliği, tehdit savurmaktan daha etkili olduğunu kanıtlıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Amansız bir yargıcın{/d} önünde duran bu gözü kara mutantın o an için korkuya yenik düşmesi, tabancasının hedeften hafifçe sapmasına yetiyor.{/n} "Bugün hükümleri ben vereceğim. Bununla başlıyoruz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even this most foolhardy of mutants succumbs to momentary fear, enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesindeki buz sakinliği, tehdit savurmaktan daha etkili olduğunu kanıtlıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Amansız bir yargıcın{/d} önünde duran bu gözü kara mutantın o an için korkuya yenik düşmesi, tabancasının hedeften hafifçe sapmasına yetiyor.{/n} "Bugün hükümleri ben vereceğim. Bununla başlıyoruz!"

languages.text: {n}La calma gélida de tu voz es más eficaz que cualquier amenaza. Ante un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}juez{mf||a} implacable{/d}, hasta el más atrevido de los mutantes sucumbe a un terror momentáneo, que basta para desviar la puntería de su pistola.{/n} «Hoy dictaré sentencias, ¡empezando por la suya!».
languages.original_text: {n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even this most foolhardy of mutants succumbs to momentary fear, enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La calma gélida de tu voz es más eficaz que cualquier amenaza. Ante un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}juez{mf||a} implacable{/d}, hasta el más atrevido de los mutantes sucumbe a un terror momentáneo, que basta para desviar la puntería de su pistola.{/n} «Hoy dictaré sentencias, ¡empezando por la suya!».

languages.text: {n}你冰冷、平静的声音比一切威胁都更加有效。即便是这个肆无忌惮的变种人，面对你这位{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}冷面无情的仲裁者{/d}时，也不禁恐惧不已，枪口也略微偏离了目标。{/n}“我今天就要宣布判决，而第一个接受审判的人就是你！”
languages.original_text: {n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even this most foolhardy of mutants succumbs to momentary fear, enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你冰冷、平静的声音比一切威胁都更加有效。即便是这个肆无忌惮的变种人，面对你这位{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}冷面无情的仲裁者{/d}时，也不禁恐惧不已，枪口也略微偏离了目标。{/n}“我今天就要宣布判决，而第一个接受审判的人就是你！”

languages.text: {n}Die eisige Ruhe deiner Stimme erweist sich als effizienter als jede Drohung. Im Angesicht eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}unerbittlichen Richters{/d} ergreift selbst diesen mutierten Dummkopf lange genug die Furcht, dass seine Pistole für einen kurzen Moment von ihrem Ziel abweicht.{/n} "Ich werde heute einige Urteile vollstrecken, und mit Euch fange ich an!"
languages.original_text: {n}The icy calm in your voice proves more effective than any threat. Standing before an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}implacable judge{/d}, even this most foolhardy of mutants succumbs to momentary fear, enough to cause the aim of his pistol to veer off slightly.{/n} "I am delivering verdicts today, and yours will be the first!"

Im Angesicht eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}unerbittlichen Richters{/d} ergreift selbst diesen mutierten Dummkopf lange genug die Furcht, dass seine Pistole für einen kurzen Moment von ihrem Ziel abweicht.{/n} "Ich werde heute einige Urteile vollstrecken, und mit Euch fange ich an!"
